title: Udyr glitch after death
body:
After I die with udyr a glitch will happen when his body will tweet out happened every time I died right after using bear stance. Link to video
https://www.facebook.com/video.php?v=626347940843693

replies.body: Thanks for the report! While we work on a fix, we've disabled this skin.

Yeah, it's even bigger here.. Its going all over the screen.

http://gyazo.com/3353e6dc07af3d752a01def4dfb3db5e

It happens random middle in the game. Not always after death.

Then they need to do something. As you see, it going all over the screen, making it hard to play.
Search for udyr, this has been reported multiple times
